item.title: 12 dead in attack in Paris
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I was doing my shopping today and the alarm was triggered, we were told to evacuate the building. Police shut off the entire area, apparently there was a suspicious package that they thought was a bomb. I think it turned out to be a false alarm, but better safe than sorry given what’s just happened in France. I’d imagine the authorities are expecting something here in the UK, so are a little on edge.

Read full topic

item.title: 12 dead in attack in Paris
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

Bowser jr:

That’s the reason you believe in the moon landing? You are really stupid if you think everything around you is a lie.

That’s not the only reason I believe in it. It’s just good evidence that it’s real.

First off I don’t think everything around me is a lie. I, however, do question a lot of things which governments do and say. Why? Because they are known to lie and do evil and/or secret things. That’s not being stupid, it’s being cautious. What’s stupid is being brainwashed into believing everything around you.

item.title: 12 dead in attack in Paris
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:13, topic:549020”][quote author=Michael P link=topic=667928.msg4467134#msg4467134 date=1420758922]

Just another stupid fudgeing false flag. Makes me sick.

What do you mean false flag?

“False flag (or black flag) describes covert military or paramilitary operations designed to deceive in such a way that the operations appear as though they are being carried out by entities, groups, or nations other than those who actually planned and executed them.”
[/quote]any actual sources to back this up or are you just pulling it out of your ass?

Lots, look it up yourself.

No, no, no. You’re not allowed to do that. Unless your statement is uncontroversial, you are not allowed to tell anyone to look up information like this themselves. Give us some credible sources to back up your statement of GTFO and go to some of the less intellectual boards like off-topic and server-help.

I don’t gotta do shit. I stated my opinion. There is lots of information out there that shows that this is a very likely false flag. If somebody wants to look into it, then do it. I’m not going to do it for you.

@naseem142

Yep, because sadly 9/11 was also a false flag most likely. I haven’t looked into it fully yet, but it’s very likely it was.

Are you one of those people who don’t believe in the moon landing and all that.[/quote]

The moon landing was real. It would of been impossible to film a fake moon landing back then. We just simply didn’t have the film required to do it. There is a video out there somewhere that talks about it.

@Sk8r, I sure do.

@Bowser jr, Many different governments have done it. Also, the U.S.A has already killed plenty of innocent citizens… So yeah…

Read full topic

item.title: 12 dead in attack in Paris
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Very “Convenient” that the criminals left some ID on the scene of the crime… at least make it believable a bit that it isn’t actually planted evidence?? Definitely something “Fishy” going on in here… Furthermore… if you look at the photo “Evidence” posted of the “Perpetrators” of this crime… THEY’RE BOTH THE SAME PERSON… coincidence??? I think not… And if you look at the mayor’s name, “Patrick Klugman”… In fact, there’s lots of incidences like this… “Charlie” “Patrick” “Molins” “Paris”… THAT’S NOT EVEN A FRENCH NAME, WHY IS HE MAYOR?? Very Very “Fishy” if you ask me… And then look at all these people calling themselves “Charlie” when they’re obviously NOT “Charlie”??? WAKE UP SHEEPLE

With the power of my deductive reasoning as shown in my post I can without a doubt say that this is obviously a “False” “Flag” set up by the United States to allow them to launch an invasion on China…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:

THERE IS NO EVIDENCE OUT THERE OF A FALSE FLAG ATTACK! Random blogs are not credible.
